author: @zazoomblog
title: Viareggio blackout a ripetizione in centro | disagi enormi per attività e residenti
text:
Viareggio blackout a ripetizione in centro | disagi enormi per attività e residenti
Viareggio, 6 marzo 2025 – blackout a ripetizione in via San Martino e aree limitrofe. Ma soprattutto, nessuna indicazione sui tempi di risoluzione dei problemi che causano disagi enormi a residenti e attività. Nella seconda metà del 2024, è successo un paio di volte che la corrente andasse via in modo prolungato, tanto da causare problemi a chi lavora e vive in zona. Da una settimana, però, il fenomeno si è intensificato e di parecchio, con la luce che salta a botte da 3-4 ore. Alla braceria Amaro, già nel fine settimana, sia sabato che domenica, ci sono stati dei problemi che hanno compromesso il servizio. Lunedì, giorno di chiusura del locale, i disagi sono stati minimi, ma la corrente è mancata comunque: “Abbiamo spostato il giorno di chiusura dalla domenica al lunedì per il corso di Carnevale – spiega Daniele Belluomini, uno dei titolari – e per due ore la signora che si occupa delle pulizie si è trovata a lavorare al buio.Leggi su Lanazione.it
Lanazione.it - Viareggio, blackout a ripetizione in centro: disagi enormi per attività e residenti

author: Keith Noonan
title: Why Tellurian Stock Is Surging Today
text:
Tellurian ( TELL -7.31% ) stock is making big gains in Thursday's trading. The liquified natural gas specialist's share price was up 7.4% as of 12:15 p.m. ET, according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence .
Tellurian submitted a filing to the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) today stating that it will be issuing stock to an institutional shareholder in exchange for debt held through bonds being relinquished. The move should improve the energy company's financial flexibility, and the market appears broadly bullish on the development.
In addition to the stock issue and bond extinguishment, a separate filing submitted to the SEC yesterday showed that another institutional investor had increased its position in Tellurian.
Tellurian is getting some institutional help Tellurian will provide 47.9 million shares of stock to High Trail Capital, an investment management firm. In exchange, $37.9 million out of a $250 million bond holding that is set to come due in 2025 will be extinguished.
News about the deal with High Trail follows a filing submitted to the SEC on Dec. 27 outlining new stock purchased by Chatterjee Fund Management. Per the filing, the firm has increased its ownership position in Tellurian to 7.3% -- up from its previous ownership position of 5.2%.
What comes next for Tellurian stock? Between High Trail taking stock in exchange for extinguishing debt obligations and Chatterjee increasing its stock holdings in Tellurian, the liquid natural gas specialist appears to be getting some notable votes of confidence from institutional investors. The stock is still down roughly 39% year to date and 84% over the last five years, but it looks like some large stakeholders see the potential for a comeback.
TELL data by YCharts
Tellurian is facing bankruptcy risks. If the business can deliver some meaningful turnaround progress and show signs it's capable of avoiding bankruptcy, the company's share price could skyrocket. But it remains a very high-risk investment even on the heels of big valuation pullbacks.

author: Damini Tripathi
title: Job Cuts at Black Forest Games Amid Embracer Group’s Ongoing Restructuring
text: Cuts at Black Forest Games, located in Offenburg, Germany, were reportedly announced on January 24, according to a source cited by Kotaku. While creative directors and most, if not all, managers are expected to retain their positions, further details are anticipated next week. Acquired by Embracer operating group THQ Nordic in 2017, Black Forest Games, founded in 2012, has over 100 employees and is known for titles such as Destroy All Humans! Remakes and the upcoming Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Last Ronin. This news comes in the wake of reports suggesting the potential closure of fellow German THQ Nordic studio Piranha Bytes as part of Embracer Group’s broader restructuring efforts. In June of the previous year, Embracer had announced the initiation of a restructuring program, which included the closure of studios, staff layoffs, and the cancellation of certain projects. Over the following months, studios like Volition, Campfire Cabal, and Free Radical Design were closed, and others, like Gearbox, were reportedly put up for sale. The restructuring led to over 900 layoffs during the company’s second financial quarter, affecting studios such as Crystal Dynamics, Beamdog, Zen Studios, and Fishlabs. In the subsequent months, further layoffs were made at New World Interactive, 3D Realms, Slipgate Ironworks, and a significant portion of Gearbox support studio Lost Boys Interactive.

organizations.name: black forest games amid embracer group

author: José María Martínez
title: Auge de la Tardebuena y la Tardevieja: crece la asistencia un 25% en dos años
text:
Auge de la Tardebuena y la Tardevieja: crece la asistencia un 25% en dos años
Se consolidan los encuentros de amigos en bares antes de la cenas del 24 y 31 de dicembre
[Las consumiciones preferidas: cerveza y vermut](#emstronglas-consumiciones-preferidas-cerveza-y-vermutnbsp-strong-em) ["Tardeo" para jóvenes y mayores](#emstrong-tardeo-para-jovenes-y-mayoresnbsp-strong-em) [Costumbre en ciudades de menor tamaño pero no exclusiva](#emstrongcostumbre-en-ciudades-de-menor-tamano-pero-no-exclusivanbsp-strong-em)
En los días previos a las celebraciones de Nochebuena y Nochevieja, un fenómeno conocido como "tardeo" ha experimentado un crecimiento significativo, consolidándose como una tendencia cada vez más arraigada en la sociedad. Esta nueva tradición, que implica pasar las horas previas a las cenas familiares de una manera más relajada y festiva, ha ganado adeptos, convirtiéndose en una práctica común entre amigos y conocidos.
Las plazas y espacios públicos se han convertido en el escenario perfecto para esta tendencia, evidenciando un ambiente optimista y animado. Según explican los hosteleros al Confidencial Digital, desde el advenimiento de la pandemia, se ha notado un incremento notable en las ganas de las personas por salir y disfrutar en las calles. Este fenómeno, popularmente denominado "tardevieja" y "tardebuena", se ha fortalecido gracias al aumento en la adquisición de comidas preparadas, lo que ha otorgado más tiempo a la población para compartir momentos entre amigos acompañados de una copa o una cerveza.
Las consumiciones preferidas: cerveza y vermut
Este evento informal, caracterizado por reunirse entre amigos para disfrutar de un momento distendido antes de las cenas familiares, ha revelado ciertos patrones en las elecciones de consumo durante estas fechas señaladas.
Según los datos recabados en distintos establecimientos hosteleros, se ha observado que las cervezas y el vermut encabezan la lista de bebidas favoritas durante este "tardeo" previo a las celebraciones. Estas opciones refrescantes y versátiles han ganado popularidad entre los participantes, ofreciendo un abanico de sabores que se adaptan al ambiente festivo.
Las cervezas, por su variedad y frescura, se han convertido en una elección recurrente entre los asistentes. Su disponibilidad en diferentes estilos y marcas permite satisfacer los gustos de los presentes, convirtiéndolas en la bebida estrella para brindar y compartir entre amigos.
El vermut, por su parte, ha experimentado un resurgimiento en los últimos tiempos, convirtiéndose en una opción sofisticada y llena de matices para quienes buscan sabores más complejos y aromáticos. Su versatilidad para disfrutarse solo, con hielo o acompañado de una rodaja de naranja, lo ha convertido en una alternativa muy demandada durante estas jornadas de celebración.
Además de las bebidas, el "tardeo" no se limita únicamente al consumo líquido. En este evento informal, también se aprecia una tendencia hacia el disfrute de tapas y raciones que complementan la experiencia de manera equilibrada. Las tapas, porciones pequeñas de diferentes platos, se convierten en la opción ideal para acompañar las bebidas, fomentando un consumo responsable y moderado.
"Tardeo" para jóvenes y mayores
Este enfoque gastronómico no solo enriquece la experiencia del "tardeo" sino que también contribuye a un consumo más responsable por parte de los participantes. El disfrute de tapas y raciones no solo complementa las bebidas, sino que también ayuda a mantener un equilibrio en el consumo, favoreciendo una experiencia social más armoniosa y consciente.
La Asociación Hostelería de España ha señalado un incremento del 25% en la asistencia a estas fechas especiales, las cuales se extienden a lo largo de todo el día. Además, destacan el hecho de que este fenómeno ha dejado de ser exclusivo de los jóvenes, abarcando ahora a personas de todas las edades que buscan disfrutar de un momento distendido antes de sumarse a las celebraciones formales en familia.
Costumbre en ciudades de menor tamaño pero no exclusiva
Según los datos recopilados por los hosteleros, esta tendencia se registra especialmente en ciudades de menor tamaño, donde la accesibilidad y la espontaneidad juegan un papel crucial. No es necesario coordinar previamente la asistencia, lo que facilita la participación de un mayor número de personas.
Este cambio en las costumbres festivas sugiere una evolución en la forma en que la sociedad disfruta de estos días señalados, donde el ambiente informal y festivo se fusiona con la tradición familiar. El "tardeo" se posiciona como una opción más enriquecedora y diversa para dar comienzo a las celebraciones navideñas, uniendo a personas de distintas generaciones en un ambiente de alegría.

author: Olivia Craighead
title: What Did Taylor Swift Say About Planned Eras Tour Attack?
text:
Upon wrapping up the European leg of the Eras Tour, Taylor Swift addressed the planned terrorist attack on her concerts in Vienna. Earlier this month, Swift was forced to cancel three shows in the city after Austrian police arrested two men in connection with a planned attack on major events in Vienna, including Swift’s concerts. Prior to now, Swift had not spoken about the threat.
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift)
“Walking onstage in London was a roller coaster of emotions,” Swift wrote in an Instagram post commemorating the last of her European shows. “Having our Vienna shows canceled was devastating. The reason for the cancellations filled me with a new sense of fear, and a tremendous amount of guilt because so many people had planned on coming to those shows. But I was also so grateful to the authorities because thanks to them, we were grieving concerts and not lives.”
Swift explained that ahead of her stint in London, she was focused on making sure that the shows were going to be safe for her fans. She stated that she worked with the staff at Wembley Stadium as well as British authorities to ensure that nothing happened in London. Swift then addressed her silence, which some fans had criticized her for following the canceled shows.
“Let me be very clear: I am not going to speak about something publicly if I think doing so might provoke those who would want to harm the fans who come to my shows,” she wrote. “In cases like this one, ‘silence’ is actually showing restraint, and waiting to express yourself at a time when it’s right to. My priority was finishing our European tour safely, and it is with great relief that I can say we did that.”
Swift now has a break until October, when she picks the tour back up in Miami. Don’t think that means she’s going to take the time to decompress and disappear, though. It’s almost football season , after all.
